https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r7kjugTRXRAUrQdtnPcbNZ5m0CX.jpg Gerardo is deeply in love with longtime lover Jonas. When Jonas falls for a stranger he met at a local nightclub, heartbroken Gerardo soon seeks solace in the arms of Sergio. Despite other interests, Gerardo and Jonas can't bring themselves to end it. Broken Sky
